articles.author: Fiona Jackson
articles.title: Why small dogs like Chihuahuas live LONGER than big breeds like Great Danes, according to science - Daily Mail
articles.description: Scientists from the University of Adelaide think that larger dog breeds have shorter life expectancies because they are more susceptible to cancer at a younger age.
articles.content:
Our furry friends come in all sorts of shapes and sizes, from the tiny, handbag sized Chihuahuas, to the house-trained horses that are Great Danes. 
Sadly, it is fairly common knowledge that the lif… [+5952 chars]

articles.author: Tom Warren
articles.title: Microsoft is changing the Print Screen key to open its Snipping Tool on Windows 11 - The Verge
articles.description: An upcoming update to Windows 11 will change how the Print Screen key works. Microsoft is defaulting the key to open its Snipping Tool instead of copying a screenshot to your clipboard.
articles.content:
